title: Creamy Caprese Quinoa Bake with Optional Chicken Basil Sausage

instructions.default: Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Tin: Defrost. Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Tin / Veggie: Defrost. Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Tin / Chicken Sausage: Defrost. Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
